Question content: Iyini i{contract}?
Explanation: i{Contract} isivumelwano somthetho phakathi kwabantu ababili noma abaningi, izinkampani noma izinhlangano

Question content: Kusho ukuthini ukubopha ngomthetho?
Explanation: Uma isivumelwano singesomthetho, uma usiphula isivumelwano uzobhekana nemiphumela yomthetho

Question content: Ngokwe nkontilaka, isho ini i{party}?
Explanation: Kuma {contract} amaningi nezivumelwano zomthetho, i{party} isho amasayidi ahlukile esivumelwaneni. Uma u{sign}a isivumelwano, wena ungenye yama {party} e {contract}

Question content: Kwenzekani uma ungalandeli imigomo nemibandela ye {contract}?
Explanation: Uma ungalandeli imigomo nemibandela ye {contract} bese ungahloniphi isivumelwano, kuthathwa njengokuphula isivumelwano se {contract}. Uma wenza lokho, ungabhekana nemiphumela enzima

Question content: Kungenzekani uma weqa i{contract}?
Explanation: Uma weqa i{contract} yakho, abanye abantu (noma izinhlangano) abasayine i{contract} nawe bangacela isinxephezelo, njenge mali

Question content: Uma ungena kuy i{contract}, uwomunye "wama {parties}" kuleso sivumelwano.
Explanation: Kuma {contract} amaningi/noma izivumelwano zomthetho, ama {parties} kusho izinhlangothi ezihlukile ze {contract}. Uma u{sign}a i{contract}, uwomunye wama {parties} kuleyo nkontilaka

Question content: Ngaphambili kokungena kuy i{contract}, kufanele wenzeni?
Explanation: Qiniseka ufunda uzwisise kahle i{contract}. Lokhu kuzokusiza ukuzwisisa ofanele ukwenze ukuze kube nethuba elincani lokweqa i{contract} yakho

Question content: Ama {contract} zingakwazi ukuthi:
Explanation: Ama {contract} angaba yimibhalokanye namazwi. i{Contract} yamazwi yisivumelwano esikhulunywayo phakathi kwabantu ababili noma abaningi. Ama {contract} abhaliwe alula ukuqiniswa kunakhulunywayo

Question content: Iyini i{contract} yamazwi?
Answer: Isivumelwano esikhulinyiwe phakathi kwabantu ababili noma abaningi
Explanation: i{Contract} yamazwi isivumelwano esokhulunywayo phakathi kwabantu ababili noma abaningi. Ama {contract} zamazwi zibonakala zingahlelekanga kunalezo ezibhaliwe

Question content: Kufanele ama {contract} zibhalwe njalo.
Explanation: Akufanele ama {contract} abhalwe njalo. Ngezinye izikhathi ama {contract} enziwa ngamazwi, kodwa abhaliwe akuvikela kakhulu, ikakhulukazi ngokomthetho

Question content: Kungakwazi ukuthi ama {contract} zibengamazwi kanti zibhalwe futhi?
Explanation: Ama {contract} zingabhalwa kanti zingabangamazwi futhi. Isibonelo, ungathola i{quote} ebhaliwe yesevisi ethize bese uyavuma ngamazwi ukuthi umsebenzi awenziwe

Question content: Kungani i{contract} ebhaliwe iphephile kunaleyo yamazwi?
Explanation: Kuphephile ukuba ne {contract} ebhaliwe ngoba konke okuvunyelwane ngakho kubhalwe phansi. Uma kunokuphikisana noma umbuzo kamuva, kunobufakazi besivumelwano

Question content: Kwezilandelayo, yini ezokuvikela kakhulu uma uvumela okuthize?
Explanation: i{Contract} ebhalwe ngokucacile iyokuvikela uma uvumela okuthize. Cela i{contract} ebhaliwe njalo kuzivumelwano ezibalulekile njenge {credit}, ukuqasha, nomshwalense

Question content: Ngaphambili koku{sign}a i{contract}, kufanele:
Explanation: Ngaphambili koku{sign}a nokuvumela i{contract}, qiniseka ukuthi uyayizwisisa kanti uvumelana nemigomo, nokuthi uyakwazi ukumelana nezindleko, izimali noma ubungozi obukhona

Question content: Kufanele wenzeni uma ungazwisisi okuthize kuy i{contract}?
Explanation: Uma ungazwisisi okuthize kuy i{contract}, Kukuwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthola ukuthi kusho ukuthini ngaphambili koku{sign}a. Uma ungakazwisisi, ungasayini

Question content: Ngemuva koku{sign}a i{contract}, kufanele ucele:
Explanation: Uma sewu{sign}a i{contract}, cela ikhophi ye {contract} ozohamba nayo. Lokhu kungasetshenziswa ukuphendula imibuzo ongaba nayo kusasa

Question content: Uma u{sign}a i{contract}, kufanele:
Explanation: Uma u{sign}a i{contract}, kufanele ugcwalise amagama nama {dates}, cisha izindawo ezivulekile, bese ubeka ama {initials} eceleni. Lokhu kuvikela ukuthi i{contract} ingashitshwa uma sewuyisayinile

Question content: Uma wenze ushintsho kukontilaka, kufanele wenzeni?
Explanation: Uma wenza ushintsho kukontilaka, qiniseka njalo ukubeka ama-initials lapho ushintshe khona. Lokhu kuyasiza ukufakazela ukuthi wenze nokuvumela ushintsho ngokwakho

Question content: Ingabe kufanele wenzeni ngaphambili koku{sign}a i{contract}?
Explanation: Njalo funda i{contract} ngaphambili koku{sign}a. Uma ungazwisisi okuthize, cela ukuchazelwa ngaphambili koku{sign}a

Question content: Kwezilandelayo, yini ewumbolekisi wezimali?
Explanation: Ama {bank}, izitolo ezithize njenge zezimphahla kanye nababolekisi abancane bayizibonelo zababolekisi bezimali. Akubona ababolekisi bonke bezimali abanikeza izikweletu ezifanayo nokuba emthethweni

Question content: Ingaba noma iyiphi inkampani engabhaliswa ukuba umbolekisi wezimali?
Explanation: Akunoma iyiphi inkampani engabhaliswa ukuba umbolekisi wezimali. Ababolekisi bezimali badinga ukuaplaya ukuze babe ababolekisi bezimali ababhalisiwe ne {National Credit Regulator} ({NCR})

Question content: i{Regulatory body} eqinisekisa ukuhambisana ne{National Credit Act} ibizwa_____
Explanation: i{National Credit Regulator} ({NCR}) inhlangano elawula ababolekisi bezimali, ama {credit bureaus} nezinye izingxenye ze {credit market}, ngokuhambisana ne {National Credit Act}

Question content: Kungani kubalulekile ukuba khona kwe {National Credit Regulator}?
Explanation: i{National Credit Regulator} ({NCR}) ibalulekile ngoba iqinisekisa ukuthi bonke ababolekisi bezimali nabathengi balalela imithetho mayelana ne {credit} South Africa

Question content: Iyini i{affordability assessment}?
Explanation: i{Affordability assessment} ilapho umbolekisi wezimali ebheka izimali zomuntu nomlando we {credit} ukubona ukuthi bangakwazi ukukhokha isikweletu

Question content: Kungani i{affordability assessment} yenziwa?
Explanation: i{Affordability assessment} idinga ukwenziwa ukuqiniseka ukuthi umuntu angakwazi ukukhokha isikweletu. Kufanele ababolekisi benze lezinhlolo ngaphambili kokunikeza isikweletu

Question content: Ubani owenza ama {affordability assessments}?
Explanation: Kufanele ababolekisi bezimali benze ama {affordability assessment} uma abathengi ba aplayela i{credit}. Kudinga abathengi babe neqiniso uma benikezela ngolwazi lwabo lezimali kubabolekisi bezimali

Question content: Uma uaplayela isikweletu, kufanele umbolekisi wakho wezimali enzeni?
Explanation: Ngaphambili kokunikeza isikweletu, umbolekisi kufanele aqiniseke ukuthi ungakwazi ukubhadala ngokwenza i{affordability assessment}. Uma ingenziwanga, unganikezwa isikweletu ongakwazi ukusibhadala

Question content: Ababolekisi bemali badinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abathengi bayakwazi ukubhadala isikweletu ngaphambili kokubavumela
Explanation: Ababolekisi bemali badinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abathengi bayakwazi ukubhadala i{credit} abayi aplayele ngaphambili kokubavumela. Bangenza lokhu ngokwenza i{affordability assessment}

Question content: Benza kanjani ababolekisi bemali ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abathengi bakwazi ukubhadala i{credit}?
Explanation: Ababolekisi bemali bangakwazi ukubheka ukuthi umthengi uyakwazi ukubhadala i{credit} ayi aplayele ngokwenza i{affordability assessment}. Lokhu, ilapho umbolekisi abheka izimali zomthengi

Question content: Siyini isivumelwano se {credit} uma umbolekisi wemali angenzi i{affordability assessment}?
Explanation: Uma umbolekisi wezimali angenzi i{affordability assessment} bese anikeza i{credit} kumuntu, leso sivumelwano se {credit} sibizwa ngesivumelwano esinganaki

Question content: Isivumelwano se {credit} esinganaki singenza ukuthi umbolekisi wezimali anike i{credit} ku:
Answer: Umthengi abazi ukuthi angeke amelane naso
Explanation: Isivumelwano se {credit} singaba sokunganaki, uma umbolekisi wezimali enze i{affordability assessment} bese ayazi ukuthi umuntu angeke amelane ne {credit}, kodwa amunikeze

Question content: Uma umthengi angazwisisi isivumelwano se {credit}, singabizwa ukuthi isivumelwano se {credit} esinganaki.
Explanation: Uma umthengi angazwisisi amalungelo wakhe nalokho afanele akwenze, kanye nezimali nezindleko zesivumelwano se {credit}, singabizwa ukuthi isivumelwano se {credit} esinganaki

Question content: Ingabe singaba ingozi kanjani isivumelwano se {credit} esinganaki kumthengi?
Explanation: Izivumelwano ze {credit} ezinganaki ziyingozi kubathengi ngoba zingaholela kuzikweletu eziphezulu, njengoba abathengi banikezwa izikweletu abangakwazi ukumelana nazo

Question content: Yini engasiza ukuvikela izivumelwano ze {credit} ezinganaki?
Explanation: i{Affordability assessment} isiza ukuvikela izivumelwano ezinganaki ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi umthengi umelana ne {credit} ayi aplayele. Ababolekisi kufanele benze lokhu ngaphambili unikeza i{credit}

Question content: Ngabe i{National Credit Act} isebenza ngani?
Explanation: Izivumelwano ze {credit} ezinganaki ziyingozi kubathengi ngoba zingaholela zikweletu eziphezulu, njengokuthi abathengi banganikezwa izikweletu abangakwazi ukumelana nazo

Question content: i{NCA} iyimithetho esebenza nge:
Explanation: i{NCA} iyimithetho esebenza nge {credit} eSouth africa. Lemithetho ithinta kakhulu abathengi nababolekisi bezimali

Question content: Abobani abathintwa kakhulu i{NCA}?
Explanation: i{NCA} ithinta kakhulu abathengi nababolekisi bezimali (Ama {banks}, ababolekisi abancane, izitolo ezithize njenge zezimpanhla noma izitolo ze {furniture}, {etc}.)

Question content: Njengomthengi, kubalulekile ukwazi nge {NCA} ngoba:
Explanation: Kubalulekile ukwazi nge {NCA} ngoba imithetho yayo yenzelwe ukuvikela abathengi nababolekisi bezimali ukuzwisisa amalungelo abo nalokho abafanele ukwenza

Question content: Uma ufuna ukuaplayela i{credit}, imiphi imithetho engakusiza ukuzwisisa amalungelo wakho?
Explanation: Imithetho ye {NCA} iyokuvikela nokukuqondisa uma usebenzisa umbolekisi wezimali. i{NCA} isiza abathengi ukwazi amalungelo abo uma be-aplayela nokusebenzisa i{credit}

Question content: i{NCA} ivikela kanjani abathengi?
Explanation: i{NCA} ivikela abathengi ngokubanikeza amalungelo avikelekile. Ababolekisi bezimali badinga ukuvuma nokuhlonipha lamalungelo uma banikeza i{credit}

Question content: Imaphi amanye amalungelo avikelekile ku {NCA}?
Explanation: Abathengi banelungelo loku aplayela i{credit}, ukuvikelwa kubandlululo uma be aplayela i{credit}, nokuba nesivumelwano sesikweletu ngolimi olulula

Question content: Kubalulekile ukwazi amalungelo wakho ku {National Credit Act} nalokho ofanele ukwenza.
Explanation: Njengo mthengi unamalungelo athize akuvikela ukungaphatheki kabi. Kodwa nawe unokufanele ukwenze. Kubalulekile ukwazi lokhu konke

Question content: Ngokusho kwe {NCA} unelungelo loku:
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {NCA}, abathengi bonke banelungelo loku aplayela i{credit}, ukunganaki iminyaka, umbala, inkolo noma isimo somnotho. i{NCA} ayinikezi bonke abathengi ilungelo lokunikezwa i{credit}

Question content: Uma ufuna ukuaplayela i{credit}, unelungelo lokwenza njalo.
Explanation: Uma ufuna ukuaplayela i{credit} kumbolekisi wezimali, kuyilungelo lakho. Angeke unikezwe i{credit} uma i{affordability assessment} ibonisa ukuthi angeke umelane nayo

Question content: Ababolekisi bezimali abavumelekile uku:
Alternative 2: Ukunikeza i{credit} kubantu bendawo ethize kuphela
Explanation: Ababolekisi bezimali abavunyelwe ukubandlulula ngokungafanele uma benikeza i{credit}. Abavunyelwe ukunikeza i{credit} kubantu bebala, inkolo noma indawo ethize kuphela

Question content: Ngokwamalungelo wakho avikelekile ku {NCA}, unelungelo loku:
Explanation: Unelungelo loku-aplayela noma uluphi uhlobo lwe {credit}, lokufaka nesikweletu, ama {credit cards}, i{vehicle financing} nesikweletu sendlu

Question content: Umbolekisi wakho wezimali akavumelekile ukukwalela i{credit} ngokubheka:
Explanation: Umbolekisi wakho wezimali akavunyelwe ukwala ukukunikeza i{credit} ngenxa yombala wakho. Unelungelo lokuvikelwa kubandlululo uma uaplayela isikweletu

Question content: Uma unganikezwanga i{credit}, unelungelo loku:
Explanation: Uma isicelo sakho se {credit} singavunyelwe, ungabuza umbolekisi wakho wezimali ukuthi kungani.Ngokusho kwe {NCA}, unelungelo lokutshelwa isizathu

Question content: Uma unganikezwanga isikweletu, ungabuza i{bank} lakho isizathu bese ulindela ukutshelwa.
Explanation: Uma i{bank} lakho lingakunikezanga iskweletu, unelungelo lokunikezwa isizathu sokuthi kungani isicelo sakho singaphumelelanga, uma ubuza lakho

Question content: Uma unganikezwanga i{credit card} i{bank} lakho, ungakwazi:
Answer: Ukubuza i-bank lakho isizathu sokuthi kungani
Alternative 2: Buza i{bank} lakho isizathu bese ungaphendulwa
Alternative 3: Buza i{bank} lakho isizathu bese unganakwa
Explanation: Uma unganikezwanga i{credit card} i{bank} lakho, ungabuza i{bank} lakho isizathu sokuthi kungani bakhethe ukungakunikezi i{credit} kanti ulindele impendulo

Question content: Liyini elinye lamalungelo wakho avikelekile ku {NCA}?
Explanation: Elinye lamalungelo avikelekile ku {NCA}, ukuba nesivumelwano se {credit} ngolimi olulula. Lapho kusho ukuthi ungazwisisa isivumelwano kalula

Question content: Uma isivumelwano se-credit sibhalwe ngolimi olulula sifanele:
Explanation: Uma isivumelwano se {credit} sibhalwe ngolimi olulula, sifanele sibelula ukusizwisisa kanti sibenzisa ulimi olulula. Ulimi olulula aluhlangahlangene noma ligcwele amagama anzima

Question content: Kungani kubalulekile ukuthi isivumelwano se {credit} sibe ulimi olulula?
Explanation: Kubalulekile ukuthi isivumelwano se {credit} sibe ngolimi olulula ngoba kusho ukuthi ungakwazi ukuzwisisa lokho okuvumayo uma usi{sign}a

Question content: Ngaphambili koku{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit}, kufanele njalo uqiniseke ukuthi:
Explanation: Uma u{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit}, uqinisekisa ukuthi uyasizwisisa sonke kahle. Ulimi lwesivumelwano kufanele lube lula ukuzwisisa

Question content: Elinye lamalungelo wakho avikelekile ku {NCA}, ilungelo lokuthola ikhophi yamahala yesivumelwano se {credit}.
Explanation: Elinye lamalungelo wakho ku {NCA} ukuthola ikhophi yamahala yesivumelwano se {credit} kumbolekisi wezimali uma sewusayinile

Question content: Uma u{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit} nombolekisi wezimali unelungelo loku:
Explanation: Uma u{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit} nombolekisi wezimali, unelungelo lokuthola ikhophi yamahala yesivumelwano

Question content: Kungani kubalulekile ukuthola ikhophi yamahala yesivumelwano sakho se {credit}?
Explanation: Ungasebenzisa ikhophi yamahala yesivumelwano se {credit} ukuphendula imibuzo ngemali oyikhokhayo, ukubona lapho isikweletu sakho siyobhadalwa nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uyazi izimfuneko zesikweletu

Question content: Kufanele wenzeni ngekhophi yakho yesivumelwano se {credit}?
Explanation: Uma u{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit} qinisekisa ukuthi uthola ikhophi yaso, akufanele umbolekisi wezimali akubhadalise ikhophi. Uma isivumelwano s i{digital} qiniseka ukuthi uyakwazi ukusithola

Question content: Uma uaplayela i{credit}, elinye lamalungelo wakho avikelekile u:
Answer: Ukuthi ulwazi lwakho lwezimali lube imfihlo
Explanation: Uma uaplayela i{credit}, i{NCA} ithi elinye lamalungelo wakho avikelekile iwukuba ulwazi lwako ngokwezimali lihlale liyimfihlo

Question content: Ngokusho kwe {NCA}, umbolekisi wezimali kufanele enze i{affordability assessment} ngaphambili kokunikeza isikweletu.
Explanation: i{National Credit Regulator}, ngokwaziswa imithetho ye {National credit Act} ifuna ababolekisi bezimali ababhalisiwe benze ama {affordability assessments} kulabo abafaka izicelo

Question content: Kufane wenzeni njengomthengi uma uaplayela i{credit}?
Explanation: Uma uaplayela i{credit}, njengomthengi kufanele utshele umbolekisi wezimali ngazo zonke izibopho zakho zemali

Question content: Yini engafanele ukuthi umbolekisi wezimali ayenze uma enza i{affordability assessment}?
Explanation: Umbolekisi wezimali akavunyelwe ukutshela abantu ngezimali zakho. Abavunyelwe ukwabelana ngolwazi lwakho lwezimali, ngaphandle kwezizathu ezithize

Question content: Unikeza isitolo sezimpahla i{payslip} yakho uma uvula i{account}. Isitolo asikwazi:
Explanation: Unelungelo elivikelekile ukuthi ulwazi lwakho luphathwe ngokwemfihlo. Ababolekisi bezimali abakwazi ukwabelana nabanye, ngaphandle kwezizathu ezithize

Question content: Ngaphambili koku{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit}, kukuwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi____________
Explanation: Kanye namalungelo wakho, unezibopho uma kuza kuzivumelwano ze {credit}. Ezinye zazo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uzwisisa yonke imininingwane ngaphambili koku{sign}a

Question content: Ngabe Kufanele ubhekisise ukuthi uzwisisa yonke imininingwane ngaphambili koku{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit}?
Explanation: Ngaphambili koku{sign}a isivumelwano se {credit}, qinisekisa ukuthi uzwisisa konke okulindelwe kuwe nombolekisi wezimali, ukufaka amalungelo wakho nokufanele ukwenze

Question content: Uma ungazwisisi okuthize kusivumelwano se {credit}, kufanele:
Explanation: Uma ungazwisisi okuthize kusivumelwano se {credit}, kufanele ucele incazelo. Ungasayini isivumelwano se {credit} uma kunokuthize ongakuzwisisi

Question content: Uku{sign}a into ongayizwisisi kuyingozi ngoba:
Explanation: Ukungazwisisi isivumelwano sakho se {credit} kuyingozi ngoba kungenza uzibophe ngezindleko ongazihlelanga. Uma uzwisisa konke, akuna zimanga

Question content: Iyini i{credit limit}?
Explanation: i{Credit limit} iwubuningi benani le {credit} elinikezwa ngumbolekisi wezimali kumthengi. Ngokujwayelekile i{credit limit} yakho ihambisana nomlando wakho we {affordability} ne {credit}

Question content: Uma une {credit} , i{credit} yokulinganisa iwu_____
Explanation: Uma i{credit card} yakho ine {credit} yokulinganisa, kusho ukuthi ungasebenzisa inani lemali ekulo kuphela, {i}.{e} i{credit limit} yakho iwu {R5000}, ungasebenzisa {R5000} kuphela

Question content: EIinye lamalungelo wakho avikelekile, IiwukwaIa uma umbolekisi wezimali efuna ukwandisa i{credit} yakho yokulinganisa.
Explanation: i{NCA} ithi ungakwala ukuthi i{credit} yokulinganisa yakho iyandiswe umbolekisi wezimali, uma ungakhululekanga ngayo

Question content: Kungani kubalulekile ukwazi ukwala ukwandiswa kwesilinganiso se {credit}?
Explanation: Kubalulekile ukwazi ukwala ukwandiswa kwesilinganiso se {credit} ngoba kusho ukuthi usebenzisa i{credit} okhululekile ngayo kuphela kanti okwazi ukuyi bhadala

Question content: Ukuba ezikweletini eziphezulu ilapho ungakwazi ukuhlangabezana nezibopho zakho zemali.
Explanation: Izikweletu eziphezulu isimo sezimali lapho umuntu engakwazi ukumelana nokubhadala izikweletu zakhe njalo. Lokho kungaholela umuntu kakhulu esikweletini uma isikhathi sihamba

Question content: Yini engabangela izikweletu eziphezulu?
Explanation: Ziningi izimbangela zezikweletu eziphezulu, njengoku qamba amanga ngomholo wakho nokuthi zingakanani izindleko zakho uma ugcwalisa ifomu yesicelo

Question content: Ufuna ukuthatha isikweletu. Kufanele umbolekisi wezimali enze:
Explanation: Uma uzothatha isikweletu, kufanele umbolekisi wakho wezimali enze i{affordability assessment} ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ungakwazi ukumelana naso

Question content: Iyini i{debt review}?
Explanation: i{Debt review} iyindlela esemthethweni yokuthola usizo uma abathengi banenkinga yesikweletu esiphezulu

Question content: Kwezilandelayo yini enzeka ku {debt review}?
Explanation: Ngesikhathi se {debt review}, umthengi ubikwa ngokomthetho ukuthi unezikweletu eziphezulu kanti i{debt counsellor} ibasiza ukulawula izimali zabo

Question content: Noma ubani angaba i{debt counsellor}
Explanation: Akunoma ubani ongakwazi ukuba i{debt counsellor}. Ama {debt counsellors} eSouth Africa kudingeka babhaliswe ku {NCR}.

Question content: Ngokujwayelekile, ama {debt counsellors} enzani kubathengi?
Explanation: i{Debt counsellor} iyokwenza uhlelo olusha lokubhadala komthengi. Bayofanele ukukhuluma nombolekisi wezimali bese babone uma evumelana nohlelo olusha lokubhadala.

Question content: Ukuthi enze uhlelo olusha lokubhadala lisebenze, umbolekisi wezimali kufanele________
Explanation: Uma uhlelo olusha lokubhadala lenziwe, i{debt counsellor} iyodinga ukuthola i{court order} ukuqinisekisa uhlelo olusha.

Question content: Ababolekisi bezimali badinga ukuvuma uhlelo olusha lokubhadala ngaphambili kokuthi liqhubeke.
Explanation: i{Debt counsellor} kudingeka ikhulume nombolekisi wezimali ukubona uma bevumelana nohlelo olusha lokubhadala.

Question content: Ku {debt review}, kwenzekani uma umbolekisi wezimali angavumelani nohlelo olusha lokubhadala?
Explanation: Uma umbolekisi wezimali angavumelani nohlelo olusha lokubhadala, indaba kufanele iye ku {magistrate's court}.

Question content: Uma ungaphansi kwe {debt review}, awukwazi:
Explanation: Uma ungaphansi kwe {debt review}, awukwazi ukuaplayela i{credit} noma unikezwe i{credit} ababolekisi bezimali abasemthethweni.

Question content: Uma uhlulwa izikweletu eziphezulu. Ungakwazi ukubona:
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {NCA}, uma uhlulwa isikweletu, ungabona i{debt counsellor}. Ama {debt counsellors} akusiza ukulawula izimali nokuthola indlela yokubhadala izikweletu zakho.

Question content: Isivumelwano se {credit} esinganaki ilapho i{affordability assessment} ingayenzwanga ngaphambili kokunukeza i{credit}.
Explanation: Isivumelwano se {credit} esinganaki ilapho umbolekisi wezimali angenzi i{affordability assessment} ngaphambili kokunukeza i{credit} kumthengi.

Question content: Uma umbolekisi wezimali anikeza i{credit} kumthengi azi ukuthi akakwazi ukumelana nayo, ibizwa ukuthi:
Explanation: Uma umbolekisi wezimali enza i{affordability assessment}, kodwa anganaki imiphumela bese anikeza i{credit} kumthengi ongakwazi ukumelana naso, isivumelwano sithathwa njenge singanaki.

Question content: Ingabe i{NCA} iqonde ukuvikela abathengi kanjani kuzivumelwano ze {credit} ezinganaki?
Explanation: i{NCA} iqonde ukuvikela abathengi ngokwenza ababolekisi bezimali ukuthi benze i{affordability assessment}, engakwazi ukusiza ukuvikela abathengi ukuba nezikweletu ezingaphezulu

Question content: Kwenzekani uma isivumelwano se {credit} sitholakala singanaki?
Explanation: Uma isivumelwano se {credit} sitholakala singanaki, isivumelwano singamiswa noma sijikwe ngendlela yokuthi izibopho zomthengi zingasa landelwa.

Question content: Ubani othatha isinqumo ukuthi isivumelwano se {credit} asinaki?
Explanation: Inkantolo kuphela ethatha isinqumo ukuthi isivumelwano se {credit} asinaki noma cha. Akuyena umthengi noma umbolekisi wezimali abangathatha isinqumo ngokwabo.

Question content: i{Consumer Protection Act} izama ukukhuthaza:
Explanation: i{CPA} iqonde ukukhuthaza ubudlelwano obulungile nobungena mfihlo phakathi kwabathengi nama {suppliers}, kanye nokwenza ibhizinisi kahle kwama {suppliers}.

Question content: Ubani othintwa i{Consumer Protection Act} kakhulu?
Explanation: i{CPA} ithinta abathengi nama {suppliers} kakhulu. Bobabili, ama {suppliers} nabathengi badinga ukuvuma nokuhlonipha lemithetho uma basebenzisana.

Question content: Ngokusho kwe {Consumer Protection Act} iyini i{supplier}?
Explanation: i{Supplier}, ibhizinisi noma inhlangano/inkampani enikezela ngama {products} noma amasevisi kubanye bese ibabiza imali yalama sevisi.

Question content: Imiphi imithetho esebenzayo kuwe uma uthenga?
Explanation: i{Consumer Protection Act} ({CPA}) imithetho evikela abathengi uma basebenzisa ama {suppliers}. Imithetho yaku {CPA} idinga ukuvunywa nokuhlonishwa yibo bobabili abathengi nama {suppliers}.

Question content: I-CPA iqonde ukuvikela abathengi ku:
Explanation: i{Consumer Protection Act}({CPA}) ivikela abathengi ukuhlukunyezwa nokungathembeki kwama-suppliers. Futhi i{CPA} ivumela abathengi ukwazi amalungelo wabo nalokho abafanele bakwenze uma bathenga.

Question content: Imithetho ebeka okujwayelekile nezinga lokuvikeleka kwabathengi i: _____
Explanation: Inhloso ye {Consumer Protection Act}({CPA}) iwukukhuthaza ubudlewano obulungile nobuhle kubathengi nama {supplier}, nokwenza imikhuba emihle yebhizinisi.

Question content: Ingabe kuvumelekile kuma {suppliers} ukunganaki amalungelo abathengi?
Explanation: Ama {suppliers} awakwazi ukunganaki amalungelo anikezwe abathengi i{Consumer Protection Act}({CPA}). Kufanele bayazi, bahloniphe kanti bayigcine lemithetho uma besebenzisana nabathengi.

Question content: Ukwazi amalungelo wakho wokuba umthengi kungakusiza ukwazi ukuzivikela ukuthi kungadlalwa ngawe.
Explanation: Kubalulekile ukwazi amalungelo wakho nalokho ofanele ukwenze njengoba kushiwo y i{Consumer Protection Act} ukuthi wazi okulindelekile kuwe namabhizinisi othenga kuwo.

Question content: Wena njengomthengi awunawo amalungelo uma uthenga ama {products} noma usebenzisa amasevisi.
Explanation: Njengomthengi unamalungelo onikezwe yi{Consumer Protection Act}({CPA}) uma uthenga ama {products} noma usebennzisa amasevisi.

Question content: Ngokusho kwe {CPA}, yini i{supplier} engakwazi ukuyenza?
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {CPA}, ama {suppliers} awakwazi ukubandlulula abathengi ngokobulili, umbala, ulimi, inkolo, ukukhubazeka, isimo somshado noma ngesizathu esithize.

Question content: Uma ucabanga ukuthi i{supplier} iyabandlulula, unelungelo lo:
Explanation: Uma ucabanga ukuthi i{supplier} iyabandlulula, unelungelo lokufaka isikhalazo ku {National Consumer Commission} mayelana ne {supplier}.

Question content: i{National Consumer Commission} ingakusiza uma:
Explanation: Inkantolo yezokulingana noma i{National Consumer Commission} ingakusiza uma ucabanga ukuthi i{supplier} ibandlulula abathengi.

Question content: i{Supplier} ikutshela ukuthi angeke ikuthengisele ngenxa yombala wakho. Lokhu :
Explanation: i{Supplier} ayikwazi kungakuthengiseli ama {product}s noma anikele ngamasevisi kuwe ngokwendawo ozalelwe kuyo. Lokhu, ubandlululo.

Question content: Iyini i{direct marketing}?
Explanation: i{Direct marketing} iwuhlobo lokuadivatayiza, lapho amabhizinesi afika kubathengi ngama {emails}, ama {SMS}, izincwadi noma ukufona ukuze kuthengiswe ama {products} noma amasevisi.

Question content: i{Direct marketing} yenziwa:
Explanation: i{Direct marketing} yenziwa ngokusebenzisa ama {emails}, ukufona nezincwadi.

Question content: Uma ungafuni ukuthola i{direct marketing}, ungakhetha uku:
Explanation: Unelungelo lokutshela ama {suppliers} (njenge zitolo nama {service providers}) ongafuni ukuthola i{directing marketing} evela kubo. Ngakho-ke ama {suppliers kufanele akuhloniphe.

Question content: Ungakhetha ukuthola noma ukungatholi i{direct marketing}.
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {Consumer Protection Act} ungakhetha ukuthi uthola kanjani i{direct marketing} (uma ufuna ukuyithola)-isibonelo, ngokwe {email}, {SMS} noma ngefoni.

Question content: Ungenza kanjani uma ungasafuni ukuthola ama {SMS} we {direct marketing}?
Explanation: Uma ungasafuni ukuthola ama {SMS} we {direct marketing}, kufanele ukwazi ukukhetha ukuphuma kuwo. Lokhu kwenzeka ngoku thumela umlayezo okhetha ukuphuma ku {supplier} eqondene nayo.

Question content: Elinye lamalungelo wakho ku {CPA}, ilungelo lakho uku_____
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {Consumer Protection Act}, unelungelo lokukhetha lapho uthenga khona izinto - noma ngamanye amagama, ilungelo lokukhetha i{supplier} ofuna ukuyisebenzisa.

Question content: Uma ungakhululekanga ngesivumelwano ne {supplier}, ungakwazi:
Answer: Ukukhetha ukwala bese uthola enye i{supplier}
Explanation: Uma ungakhululekanga ngesivumelwano osi aplayele ne {supplier}, unelungelo lokwala bese ukhetha enye i{supplier} okhululekile ngayo.

Question content: Yini evumelekile ukuyenza uma ungasafuni ukuthenga esitolo esithize?
Explanation: Uma ungasafuni ukuthenga esitolo esithize, unelungelo lokukhetha esinye isitolo.

Question content: Yini isivumelwano se {fixed term}?
Explanation: Isivumelwano se {fixed term} siyi{contract} ehlala isikhathi esithize, njenge zinyanga eziwu {12} noma izinyanga eziwu {24}

Question content: Isivumelwano se {fixed term} kufanele sibe:
Explanation: Isivumelwano se {fixed term} sidinga ukuba ne {date} yokuqala neyokugcina kwaso ecacile. isivumelwano se {fixed term} asikwazi ukungabi ne {date} yokugcina kwaso.

Question content: Yini isikhathi esiphezulu sesivumelwano se {fixed term}?
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {CPA}, izivumelwano ze {fixed term} kufanele zihlale okungaphezulu izinyanga eziwu {24}. Ungakwazi, kodwa, ukuvuma isivumelwano se {fixed term} eside uma ufuna.

Question content: Njengomthengi, unelungelo loku:
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {CPA} kanye nelungelo lokukhetha, abathengi banelungelo lokukhansela noma bavuselele izivumelwano ze {fixed term}.

Question content: Kuzivumelwano ze {fixed term}, iyini iphenalthi yokukhansela?
Answer: Imali ebhadalwa uma kuqedwa isivumelwano masinyane
Explanation: Iphenalthi inani lemali elidinga ukubhadalwa njenge fayini. Uma umthengi ekhansela isivumelwano se {fixed term} ngaphambili kokuthi siphele, banga bhadala iphenalthi.

Question content: Uma ukhansela isivumelwano se {fixed term} singaka pheli, yini ofanele ukuyenza?
Explanation: Uma ukhansela isivumelwano se {fixed term} ngaphambili kokuphela kwaso, ungabizwa imali yephenalthi i{supplier}. Lenhlobo yephenalthi ijwayelekile uma isivumelwano sikhanselwa masinyane.

Question content: Uma ufuna ukukhansela isivumelwano se {fixed term}, udinga ukunikeza i{notice} yamalanga amangakhi?
Explanation: Uma ufuna ukukhansela isivumelwano se {fixed term} singakapheli, udinga ukunikeza i{supplier} i{notice} yamalanga awu {20} okusebenza. Noma ngabe uyakwenza lokhu ungabizwa imali yephenalthi.

Question content: i{Contract} yakho ye {cellphone} iphelile kanti awufuni ukuyivuselela. Kufanele ubizwe imali yephenalthi?
Explanation: Ezinye izivumelwano ze {fixed}-{term} ziyazivuselela uma zifika ekugcineni kwe {term}. Kodwa uma ufuna ukusikhansela ngokuphelele uma sesiphelile, akufanelanga ubizwe imali yephenalthi.

Question content: Ufuna ukukhansela i{contract} yakho ye {internet} ingakapheli. i{Supplier} yakho ingenzani?
Explanation: Uma ufuna ukukhansela i{contract} yakho ye {internet} ingakapheli, i{supplier} yakho ingakubiza imali yephenalthi.

Question content: Uma ufuna ukulungisa noma isevisi yokugcina yenziwe, ungakwazi ukucela i{supplier} i{quote}?
Explanation: Umthengi uvumelekile ukucela i{supplier} i{quote} ebhaliwe ngaphambili kokwenza isinqumo sokuthi noma ufuna ukusebenzisa i{supplier} noma athole isevisi noma ukulungisa kwenziwe.

Question content: Ingabe i{supplier} ayivunyelwe ukwenzani?
Explanation: i{Supplier} ayivunyelwe ukubhadalisa umthengi i{quote}, uma ayicela.

Question content: Uma umthengi anikezwa i{quote} yokulungisa noma isevisi, anga:
Alternative 1: Enza ukuthi isevisi yenziwe kanti ungabhadali
Alternative 3: Enza ukuthi isevisi nokulungisa kwenziwe kanti ungabhadali
Explanation: Uma umthengi enikeziwe i{quote}, angakhetha ukuthi uyathanda ukulungisa noma isevisi yenziwe noma cha. Bavumelekile ukukhetha ukuthi kungenziwa lutho.

Question content: Kufanele i{supplier} ithole imvume yakho ebhalwe phansi ngaphambili kokwenza umsebenzi wokugcina/ukulungisa?
Explanation: Kufanele i{supplier} itshele umthengi ngaphambili kokulungisa noma ukwenza isevisi. Abakwazi ukwenza ukulungisa/isevisi bese babiza imali, uma bangazange bazise umthegi mayelana nokulungisa/nesevisi.

Question content: Yini okufanele umthengi akwenze ngaphambili kokuthi i{supplier} yenze ukulungisa noma isevisi?
Explanation: Umthengi udinga ukutshelwa ngaphambili kokuthi i{supplier} yenze ukulungisa noma isevisi kanti umthengi udinga ukuvuma ukuthi ukulungisa noma isevisi ingakwazi kanti kufanele yenziwe.

Question content: Ingabe umakhi udinga ukukwazisa ngaphambili kokulungisa indlu yakho?
Explanation: Noma yiphi i{supplier}, njengomakhi, udinga ukukwazisa ngaphambili kokwenza ukulungisa noma isevisi. Uma bangakwazisi, awukwazi ukubizwa imali.

Question content: Ungakwazi ukwala ukuthenga ama {products} wokubukisa noma asevuliwe ngaphambilini.
Explanation: Njengomthengi unelungelo lokwala ukuthenga ama {products} asetafuleni lokubukisa, ku {mannequin} noma ku into efanayo ethatha ubusha bama {products}

Question content: Uma unikezwa i{product} evuliwe ungaphikelela ukuthi ishintshwe nge:
Explanation: Uma i{supplier} (njenge sitolo noma umkhiqizi) akunikeza i{product} evuliwe, kuyilungelo lakho ukwala leyo {product} bese ucela engakavulwa.

Question content: Unelungelo lokuhlola izimpahla ezilethiwe kuqala, ngaphambili kokuzimukela.
Explanation: Uma ama {products} alethiwe kuwe, unelungelo lokubheka nokuqinisekisa ukuthi awamoshekanga noma alungile, ngaphambili koku{sign}a.

Question content: Ungenzani uma izimpahla ozithengile zimoshakele?
Answer: Zibuyisele emuva bese ucela ukubuyiselwa imali
Explanation: Uma uthenga izimpahla ezimoshakele, unelungelo loku zibuyisela ku {supplier} bese ucela ukubuyiselwa imali, uma nje kungewena ozimoshile (lokhu kudinga ukwenziwa ngesikhathi esithize).

Question content: Ngabe kufanele ama {suppliers} anikeze abathengi isikhathi sokuhlola ama {products} athengiwe noma alethiwe.
Explanation: Kufanele ama {suppliers} anikeze abathengi ithuba lokuhlola ama {products} alethiwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi awamoshekanga, awalungile noma asezingeni elibi.

Question content: Uma ulethelwa ama {products} angalungile, ungakwazi:
Explanation: Uma umthengi alethelwa impahla esezingeni elibi, engalungile noma emoshakele, angakwazi ukuyi buyisela ku {supplier} bese acela ukubuyiselwa imali (Lokhu kudinga ukwenziwa ngesikhathi esithize).

Question content: Ungenziwa ukuthi ubhadale i{product} obengeke uyithenge uma u_____
Explanation: i{Supplier} ingabiza imali yokulahlekelwa noma ukumoshakala kwempahla kubathengi uma bemosha izinto ngamabomu, noma uma bamosha izinto ngokwenza banganaki.

Question content: Kufanele wenzeni uma uthenge ihembe elibhobokile?
Explanation: Uma uthenga ihembe, noma enye i{product} emoshakele noma engalungile ngendlela ethize, ungakwazi ukuyibuyisela ku {supplier} bese ucela ukubuyiselwa imali (Lokhu, ukwenziwa ngesikhathi esithize).

Question content: Unelungelo lokuthola isivumelwano ngolimi olulula.
Explanation: Unelungelo lokucela i{contract} noma isivumelwano ngolimi lulula, noma ngamanye amagama, indlela yokubhala elula ukuyizwisisa.

Question content: Ama {suppliers} (ukufaka izitolo) kufanele ba:
Explanation: Kufanele ama {suppliers} abonakalise ngokucacile izintengo endaweni lapho abathengi bazozibona khona. Abakwazi ukufihla noma ukuvala izintengo.

Question content: Kufanele ama {suppliers} enzeni uma beadivathayiza i{sale} noma i{promotion}?
Explanation: Kufanele ama {suppliers} abonakalise ngokucacile i{date} yokuqala nokugcina kwama {sales} noma ama {promotions} kuma {promotional materials}, njengama {flyers} noma ama {brochures}.

Question content: Uma i{product} inezintengo ezimbili ezihlukile, umthengi angakwazi ukucela uku:
Alternative 2: Bhadala eyodwa bese athola enye mahala
Explanation: Uma i{product} inezintengo ezimbili ezibonakalisiwe, umthengi angacela ukubhadala intengo ephansi yalezo zombili ze {product}. i{Supplier} ayikwazi ukubiza umthengi intengo ephezulu kulezo zombili.

Question content: Ngabe abathengi bangakwazi ucela ama {suppliers} ama {receipts} noma ama {invoices}?
Explanation: Abathengi bangakwazi ukucela ama {suppliers} ama {receipt} noma ama {invoice} ngemuva kokuthenga. Akudingeki ukuthi babhadale i{receipt} noma i{Invoice}.

Question content: Ikuphi kulokhu okufanele i{receipt} noma i{invoice} ibe nakho?
Explanation: i{Receipt} noma i{invoice} idinga ukuba negama, incazelo kanye nentengo yempahla, ukufaka ne {tax}, kanye ne {date} yokuthenga negama le {supplier}, i{address} kanye ne {contact information}.

Question content: Ungenzani uma i{TV} inezintengo ezimbili ezihlukile ezibonakalisiwe?
Answer: Cela ukubhadala intengo ephansi kulezo zombili
Alternative 3: Cela ukuthenga i{TV} eyodwa uthole enye mahala
Explanation: Uma izintengo ezimbili zibonakalisiwe ku {product} eyodwa, njenge {TV}, ungacela ukubhadala intengo ephansi kuzo zombili. i{supplier} ayikwazi ukukutshela ukuthi ubhadale intengo ephezulu.

Question content: Uma uthenga into ethize esitolo, ungacela i{receipt}.
Explanation: Unelungelo lokucaela i{receipt} noma i{invoice} ngemuva kokuthenga. i{Receipt} noma i{invoice} idinga ukuba nolwazi oluthize njenge gama, incazelo kanye nentengo.

Question content: Kwezinye izinto, yini okufanele i{brochure} ye {sale} yesitolo se {grocery} iveze?
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {Consumer Pretection Act}, i{brochure}, i{flyer} noma uhlobo oluthize loku adivathayiza i{promotion}/{sale} idinga ukubonisa ngokucacile i{date} yokuqala nokugcina kwe {sale}.

Question content: Yini i{supplier} engakwazi ukuyenza uma iadivathayiza ama {products} noma amasevisi?
Explanation: Ama {suppliers} awavumelekile ukusebenzisa ulwazi olungelona ngamabomu mayelana nama {products} noma amasevisi uma be adivathayiza ibhizinisi labo.

Question content: Ingabe ama {suppliers} ayavunyelwa ukuqamba amanga ngentengo ye {product}?
Explanation: i{Supplier} ayikwazi ukuqamba amanga ngentengo yama {products}, ngisho uma bakwenza ngomzamo wokuphakamisa i{product} yabo.

Question content: i{Supplier} ingengabi neqiniso ngezinzuzo ze {product}
Explanation: i{Supplier} ayivunyelwe ukungabi neqiniso ngezinzuzo ze {product}, isibonelo, i{shampoo} angeke ithi, iyokwenza izinwele zakho zikhule uma ingakwazi ukukhulisa izinwele zakho.

Question content: Uma uadivathayiza isevisi, i{supplier} angeke:
Explanation: i{Supplier} ayikwazi ukuqambe amanga ngezintengo zamasevisi wabo uma beadivathayiza ibhizinisi labo. Angeke futhi baqambe amanga ngezinzuzo noma ukusebenza kwe {product}.

Question content: Ingabe i{supplier} ivunyelwe ukunikeza imivuzo ngendlela ye {loyalty programme} bese ahlela ukungayinikezi?
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {CPA}, ama {suppliers} awavunyelwe ukunikeza imivuzo ngendlela ye { Loyalty programme} bese hlela ukunganikezi abathengi (uma behlangabezana nezimfuneko zokuwathola).

Question content: Ngaphili kokungena ku {loyalty programme}, ikhuphi kulezi ofanele uboniswe?
Explanation: Amaphepha nge {loyalty programmes} kufanele afake incazelo ye {programme} nomvuzo, amagama wama {products}/amasevisi athintekayo kanye nemiyalelo yokuthi ungena kanjanibese uthola imivuzo.

Question content: Amaphepha we {loyalty programmes} kufanele afake:
Explanation: Amaphepha we {loyalty programme} kufanele afake ama {contact details}, ukuze abathengi bakwazi ukungena ku {programme} noma bathole imivuzo abayizuzile.

Question content: Yiziphi kulezi ofanele uzilindele ukuzibona kufomu yesicelo se {loyalty programme}?
Explanation: Uma uaplayela i{loyalty programme}, kufanele i{supplier}/{service provider} iqinisekise ukuthi ukwazi ukuthola kalula incazelo ye {loyalty programme}.

Question content: Ikuphi kwezilandelayo i{supplier} ayivunyelwe ukukwenza?
Explanation: i{Supplier} ayivumelekile ukulimaza, ukuhlukumeza, ukusabisa, ukusongela noma ukucindezela ngokungalungile umthengi.

Question content: i{Supplier} ayivunyelwe uku:
Alternative 3: Bacele ukuthi ubhadale ngemali hayi i{card}
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {Consumer Protection Act}, ama {suppliers} awavumelekile ukungabi neqiniso ngama {products} noma amasevisi uma bewa adivathayiza noma bekhuluma ngawo kuwe njengomthengi.

Question content: Kwenzekani uma umthengi abhadala i{product} bese i{supplier} iphelelwa i{stock}?
Explanation: Uma umthengi abhadala i{product} bese i{supplier} iphelelwa i{stock} yaleyo {product}, i{supplier} kufanele ibuyisele imali yomthengi nenzalo kanti ibuyisele ezinye izindleko ezengeziwe.

Question content: Ingabe i{supplier} akuvumelekile ukuthi yenzeni uma uthenga?
Explanation: Uma uthenga, i{supplier} ayivunyelwe ukukucindezela okungalungile uma uthenga, njengo ukukuthethisa, ukuhlasela noma ukukusongela ngokufuna ukukulimaza.

Question content: Uya kubani uma ucabanga ukuthi i{contract} ingaba ingalungile?
Explanation: Uma ucabanga ukuthi i{contract} oyisayine ayilunganga, engacabangeli noma okungalungile, ungaya ku {National Consumer Tribunal} ({NCT}).

Question content: Ingabe kufanele ama {suppliers} enzeni uma ama {products} wabo athengiswa amoshakale noma angaphephanga?
Answer: Abuyisele imali kumthengi alungise nokunikeza enye
Explanation: Uma ama {products} amoshakale noma angaphephanga, kufanele ama {suppliers} abuyisele imali kumthengi noma anikeze eyinye noma alungise ama {products}. Kufanele i{supplier} ibhadale hayi umthengi.

Question content: Abathengi kufanele babuyise ama {products} amoshakele noma angaphephanga ngemva kwesikhathi eside kangakanani?
Explanation: Abathengi kufanele babuyisele ama {products} amoshakale noma angaphephanga phakathi kwezinyanga eziwu 6 ukucela ukubuyiselwa imali, ukunikezwa enye noma ukulungisa, i{supplier} (kufanele ibhadale).

Question content: Uma ubhadala isevisi, i{CPA} ithi kufanele ibe________
Alternative 1: Yasezingeni elibi kanti yenziwa emuva kwesikhathi
Alternative 3: Yezinga elibi neyenzwe emuva kwesikhathi kakhulu
Explanation: Uma umthengi abhadala isevisi, bangalinda isevisi yezinga elihle neyenziwa ngesikhathi ne {supplier}.

Question content: Ama {products} ayingozi njenga ama{chemical} kufanele _______
Explanation: Uma i{product} iyingozi, i{supplier} kufanele iyilebule ngokucacile ukuthi abathengi bazi ukuthi iyingozi. i{Supplier} kufanele futhi itshele umthengi indlela yokusebenzisa i-product ngokuphepha.

Question content: Uma uthenga i{TV} bese ilethwa iphukile, ungenzani?
Explanation: Uma i{product} ethize oyithengile ilethwa imoshakele noma iphukile ngendlela ethize, cela i{supplier} ikubuyisele imali, ilungise i{product} noma ikunike enye. i{supplier} kufanele ibhadale.

Question content: Ama {products} ayingozi kufanele aze namalebula kanye nezixwayiso zeziyalezo ezicacile ngendlela yokuwasebenzisa.
Explanation: i{Product} eyingozi ngayinye njenge {toxic cleaning detergent} kufanele ibe nelebula yesixwayiso esicacile kanye neziyalelo zokuyisebenzisa ngokuphepha.

Question content: Siyasibiza ukuthini isivumelwano lapho i{supplier} ibamba izimphahla ozifunayo, kuze kube uzibhadale zonke?
Explanation: Isivumelwano se {lay}-{by} senzeka uma umthengi abhadala imphahla kwesikhathi esithize kanti i{supplier} igcina ama {products} kuze kube lapho abhadalwa. Umthengi kudingeka abhadale i{deposit}.

Question content: Ngokusho kwe {CPA}, ungathenga ama {products} noma amasevisi ngokusebenzisa isivumelwano se {lay}-{by}?
Explanation: Ngokusho kwe {CPA}, abathengi bangathenga ama {products} namasevisi ngezivumelwano ze {lay}-{by} nama {suppliers}.

Question content: Kungenzekani kulezi uma i{supplier} ingakunikezi i{product} oyithengile nge {lay}-{by}?
Explanation: Uma uqeda ukubhadala into ethize nge {lay}-{by} kodwa i{supplier} ingagcinanga ngempela i{product} yakho, i{supplier} ingalungisa izinto ngokukunikeza i{product} efanayo noma engconywana.

Question content: Yini ongayicelayo uma isitolo singagcinanga imphahla ye {lay}-{by} oyibhadale ngokugcwele?
Explanation: Uma i{supplier} ingakunikezi ama {products} owabhadale, ungacela ukubuyiselwa imali ngenzalo.
